segments.text: I can’t help but chuckle a bit at the sight of the boy reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that laughter dies quickly as I see the precarious position he’s in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is mimicking his excitement, but it’s all too risky for my liking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would look up, notice the water, notice the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels so absurd that she stands there while the chaos unfolds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows how fragile this moment really is, how quickly it could shatter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Will she remember this day as just another ordinary moment in the kitchen?
segments.speaker: PAR
